summary: This bill, the Enhancing Necessary Federal Offenses Regarding Child Exploitation Act (ENFORCE Act), amends Title 18 of the United States Code to strengthen enforcement related to child pornography and obscene visual representations of child sexual abuse. Key provisions include clarifying production definitions related to child pornography, removing the statute of limitations for certain offenses, mandating sex offender registration for related crimes, prohibiting reproduction of obscene visual depictions in discovery, and establishing detention and supervised release guidelines for offenders. The bill aims to protect children and increase penalties for those who exploit them.
